mapper.sql: cbe.id, cbe.custom_id, cbe.organization_id, cbe.insert_time, cbe.isdelete, cbe.last_check_time, ci.idcard, ci.vipcard, ci.mobile, ci.username, ci.password, ci.name, ci.sex, ci.birthday, ci.body_height, ci.weight, ci.zhiwen_code, ci.zhiwen_path, lo.name AS organization_name
mapper.select:
select
FROM custom_beloneto_ent cbe LEFT JOIN custom_info ci ON ci.id = cbe.custom_id LEFT JOIN ly_organization lo ON cbe.organization_id = lo.id where cbe.isdelete = 0 AND ci.isvalid = 1
AND cbe.organization_id = ${organization_id}
AND cbe.insert_time >= '${sub_point_id}'
AND cbe.insert_time <= '${insert_time_end}'
AND ci.name = '${name}'
ORDER BY ${orderby}

SELECT per.bit_item_id, per.gen_min_value, per.gen_max_value, per.gen_in_value, per.in_value_score, per.check_value, per.item_score, (SELECT cpl.name FROM cf_pingfen_leve cpl WHERE cpl.id = per.orgin_leve_id) AS orgin_leve_id, (SELECT cpl.name FROM cf_pingfen_leve cpl WHERE cpl.id = per.tzed_leve_id) AS tzed_leve_id, per.gen_quanzhong, per.quanzhong_score, csi.name FROM physical_examination_result per LEFT JOIN check_small_item csi ON csi.id = per.small_item_id WHERE per.examination_record_id = #{examination_record_id}
